SQL.LOAD: SELECT migration_path_id, company_group_id, code, description, created_by, modified_by, created_date, modified_date FROM elp_migration_path WHERE migration_path_id = :migration_path_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT migration_path_id, company_group_id, code, description, created_by, modified_by, created_date, modified_date FROM elp_migration_path WHERE --dynamic_where_clause --dynamic_order_by_clause
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_migration_path SET company_group_id = :company_group_id, code = :code, description = :description WHERE migration_path_id = :migration_path_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_migration_path ( migration_path_id, company_group_id, code, description ) VALUES ( :migration_path_id, :company_group_id, :code, :description )
